td.content: s:43 yo white female switchboard operator complained of mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. patient denied any fall or trauma. o:Height 66 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:patient complains of recurrent Heart over the past month. she is a white female switchboard operator aged 43 yrs. o:Height 65 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Heart = normal S1, S2, no murmurs, laterally displaced PMI a:High Blood Cholesterol p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cholestyramine - 4 g 2 x day, and ordered Lipid Panel.

s:pt presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school x 6 weeks. pt also reports chronic mild difficulty with reading and writing. she is a 44 yo F. o:Height 66 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

content2.Unmatched: pt also reports chronic mild difficulty

td.content: s:44 yr old white F presents with intermittent vision loss in one eye for more than 7 weeks. o:Height 66 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17, Neck = carotid bruit heard a:High Blood Cholesterol p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:pt complains of intermittent vision loss in one eye x 7 weeks. she is a 44 YO white F switchboard operator. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 66 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18, appears anxious and is diaphoretic a:High Blood Cholesterol p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemfibrozil - 1200 mg /day in 2 divided doses.
